Room.Name: Imeldia's Potions and Stuff
Room.ShortDescription: You can see by the way the shop is put together that this must be some sort of magic shop. There are bubbling potions everywhere you look.
Room.LongDescription: Imeldia is not the greatest alchemist in the land, but provides her customers with a number of essential potions and powerders that might be useful in their adventures through Oceancrest.
